36
Ontological Engineering
36
Life Cycle Models for Ontology Networks

Ontology network life cycle model: a
model to describe how to develop (and
maintain) an ontology network project.

How to organize the processes and activities of the NeOn
Glossary into phases or stages

Set of two ontology network life cycle
model:

Waterfall ontology network life cycle model.

Iterative-Incremental ontology network life cycle model.

Relation between the set of two life cycle
models and the set of nine scenarios

Both models and scenarios takes into account
the
importance
of
reusing
and
reengineering
knowledge
resources and merging resources.

The ontology life cycle is the specific sequence of
activities that the ontology practitioners carry out for developing
an ontology.
Set of Ontology Network Life
Cycle Models

Iterative-Incremental Model
